# Action Identifiers

**API Collection**

These constants are the predefined action identifiers used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/action(forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/add(_:forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/defaultAction(forKey:)], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/removeAnimation(forKey:)], Layer Filters, and the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAction] protocol method [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAAction/run(forKey:object:arguments:)].

## Constants

- **kCAOnOrderIn**: The identifier that represents the action taken when a layer becomes visible, either as a result being inserted into the visible layer hierarchy or the layer is no longer set as hidden.
- **kCAOnOrderOut**: The identifier that represents the action taken when the layer is removed from the layer hierarchy or is hidden.
- **kCATransition**: The identifier that represents a transition animation.

## Constants

- **CAAutoresizingMask**: These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/autoresizingMask] property.
- **CAEdgeAntialiasingMask**: This mask is used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/edgeAntialiasingMask] property.
- **Identity Transform**: Defines the identity transform matrix used by Core Animation.
- **Scaling Filters**: These constants specify the scaling filters used by [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/magnificationFilter] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer/minificationFilter].
- **CATransform3D**: The standard transform matrix used throughout Core Animation.
- **CALayer.DynamicRange**
